mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS id, ( CASE WHEN a.alias_name IS NULL THEN '' ELSE a.alias_name END ) AS aliasName, ( CASE WHEN b.url IS NULL THEN '' ELSE b.url END ) AS iconUrl, ( CASE WHEN a.app_icon_md5 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE a.app_icon_md5 END ) AS iconMd5, ( CASE WHEN a.enclosure_id IS NULL AND ( SELECT c.url FROM webhome_enclosure c WHERE c.id = a.enclosure_id ) IS NULL THEN '' ELSE ( SELECT c.url FROM webhome_enclosure c WHERE c.id = a.enclosure_id ) END ) AS enclosureUrl, ( CASE WHEN a.enclosure_md5 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE a.enclosure_md5 END ) AS enclosureMd5, a.first_push as firstPush, a.order_num as orderNum FROM pay_config a LEFT JOIN webhome_enclosure b ON a.app_icon_id = b.id WHERE a.`enable` = 1 AND a.delete_status = 0 AND a.id <> ${@com.xmsy.server.zxyy.manager.common.utils.Constant@DEFAULT_PAY} ORDER BY a.order_num

SELECT a.id AS id, ( CASE WHEN a.alias_name IS NULL THEN '' ELSE a.alias_name END ) AS aliasName, ( CASE WHEN b.url IS NULL THEN '' ELSE b.url END ) AS iconUrl, ( CASE WHEN a.web_icon_md5 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE a.web_icon_md5 END ) AS iconMd5, ( CASE WHEN a.enclosure_id IS NULL AND ( SELECT c.url FROM webhome_enclosure c WHERE c.id = a.enclosure_id ) IS NULL THEN '' ELSE ( SELECT c.url FROM webhome_enclosure c WHERE c.id = a.enclosure_id ) END ) AS enclosureUrl, ( CASE WHEN a.enclosure_md5 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE a.enclosure_md5 END ) AS enclosureMd5, a.first_push as firstPush, a.order_num as orderNum FROM pay_config a LEFT JOIN webhome_enclosure b ON a.web_icon_id = b.id WHERE a.`enable` = 1 AND a.delete_status = 0 ORDER BY a.order_num
